title.narrative: Multi Donor Trust Fund for the Agriculture Markets and Agribusiness Development Project in Senegal

description.narrative: The objective of the Multi Donor Trust Fund (MDTF) is to promote commercialization of non-traditional agriculture products, and to increase revenues of producers. It will support the efforts of the Government of Senegal to increase non-traditional agricultural exports and farm revenues of target producers (the Program) and provide co-financing to the IDA Project "Agriculture Markets and Agribusiness Development Project" (Credit 4151-SE) (the IDA Credit). The MDTF will complement the IDA Credit to expand the Program's activities, particularly in the Niayes Areas and the Casamance regions, and will foster public-private-partnership for implementing good agribusiness practices in Senegal.
